Literature.Title: Characterization of brevilaterins, multiple antimicrobial peptides simultaneously produced by Brevibacillus laterosporus S62-9, and their application in real food system.
Literature.Author: Ning Y, Han P, Ma J, Liu Y, Fu Y, Wang Z, Jia Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2.15µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes 10403s(MIC=2.15µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 63302(MIC=2.15µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=4.3µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 44752(MIC=31.25µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis CMCC 50041(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas fluorescens ATCC 13525(MIC=31.25µg/ml),Cronobacter sakazakii ATCC 29544(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Penicillium citrinum ATCC 10106(MIC=31.25µg/ml),Aspergillus brasiliensis ATCC 16404(MIC=62.5µg/ml)
